price: Not a single town We destroyed before them had believed[2]. Will they then believe?
arabic: مَآ ءَامَنَتۡ قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآۖ أَفَهُمۡ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: [2] Although they witnessed signs and miracles.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: mā āmanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknāhā afahum yu'minūna
